src_original: bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ.  saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisattvair iti.
āyuṣamāṃ cchāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat.
śālistambham avalokya bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtram idam uktaṃ.
yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati.  sa dharmaṃ paśyati.  yo dharmaṃ paśyati.
sa buddhaṃ paśyatīty uktvā bhagavāṃs tūṣṇīṃbabhūva.  tad asya bhagavatā bhāṣitasya sūtrasya ko 'rthaḥ.
